original_text: He lives in a town that is empty. No one else lives in the houses there. The buildings will soon fall down and they will become heaps of stones. He lives in a town that is empty.
korean_text: 그는 황폐한 성읍, 사람이 살지 아니하는 집, 돌무더기가 될 곳에 거주하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: No one else lives in the houses there
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳 집들에는 다른 사람들이 살지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: The buildings will soon fall down
and they will become heaps of stones
He lives in a town that is empty
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 텅 빈 도시에 살고 있습니다
